Request Fulfillment Management.objective: Thiết lập hệ thống quản lý Request Fulfillment chuyên nghiệp với metrics tracking, quality measurement và ITSM integration để nâng cao hiệu quả phục vụ người dùng

in_scope: Thiết lập metrics tracking (SLA %, cycle time)
Xây dựng hệ thống CSAT và quality measurement

key_deliverables: Dashboard tracking 5 key metrics (SLA %, cycle time, backlog, resolution time, user satisfaction)
CSAT survey process và quality metrics framework
Monthly service review process với bottleneck analysis
User engagement plan và communication strategy

milestones: T6: Business service mapping hoàn thành

success_criteria: Monthly service review được thực hiện đúng lịch

resources_required.training: ITIL Service Request Management, Metrics & Analytics

risks_and_mitigation.risk: User không tham gia CSAT survey
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Gamification, incentives, đơn giản hóa survey

risks_and_mitigation.risk: ITSM integration phức tạp
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Phân giai đoạn, pilot với scope nhỏ trước

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Resistance to change từ team
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Training, communication, involve team sớm

Incident Management.objective: Xây dựng quy trình Incident Management tuân thủ ITIL/ISO với SLA rõ ràng, escalation formal và automation để giảm MTTR và nâng cao user satisfaction

in_scope: Định nghĩa và gán Incident Manager role
out_of_scope: Major Incident Management (sẽ làm giai đoạn sau)

key_deliverables: Incident Manager role definition và assignment
SLA document đã được phê duyệt (P1: 4h, P2: 8h, P3: 24h, P4: 72h)
Escalation matrix theo severity và technical domain
Automated incident creation và assignment workflow

resources_required.training: ITIL Incident Management, Automation tools, ITSM platform

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Incident Manager role không được chấp nhận bởi team
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Clear role definition, authority, training, management support

risks_and_mitigation.risk: SLA quá aggressive, không đạt được
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Baseline measurement trước, SLA realistic dựa trên data

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Automation gây lỗi hoặc mis-assignment
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Pilot kỹ, có manual fallback, continuous tuning

Change Management.objective: Nâng cao Change Management từ ad-hoc lên process maturity level 3-4 với risk-based approach, formal governance, automation và compliance tracking
key_deliverables: Risk assessment framework (scale 1-5) với escalation paths
Data retention policy (1-3-5 năm theo tier) và backup procedure
CM audit schedule và compliance checklist
Simplified CR templates (3 loại: Standard, Normal, Emergency)
CAB charter với decision criteria và meeting cadence
CFR analysis process và improvement backlog
CMDB integration for change impact analysis
CM training program và certification requirements

resources_required.training: ITIL Change Management, Risk Management, CAB leadership

risks_and_mitigation.risk: CAB meetings quá nhiều, impact productivity
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Pre-screening, batch approval, emergency CAB only khi cần

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Risk assessment subjective, không consistent
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Clear criteria, training, regular calibration

risks_and_mitigation.risk: CMDB data không accurate, impact analysis sai
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: CMDB accuracy improvement parallel, validation process

Configuration Management.objective: Triển khai CMDB chuyên nghiệp thay thế Excel, với formal policy, automated discovery, relationship mapping và integration với ITSM processes

in_scope: CI relationship và service dependency mapping
out_of_scope: Full enterprise architecture modeling (giai đoạn sau)
Financial asset management integration (nếu cần tool khác)

key_deliverables: CMDB policy document đã được phê duyệt
CI classification schema và relationship types
CI relationship map cho top 20 critical services
Audit process và quarterly audit schedule
CMDB Steward role definition và assignment

milestones: T5: Tool implementation, initial data load

resources_required.training: CMDB best practices, Tool-specific training, ITIL Configuration Management

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Tool selection sai, không meet requirements
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Thorough RFP, POC với 2-3 vendors, stakeholder review

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Data migration từ Excel phức tạp, nhiều lỗi
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Data cleansing trước, phân giai đoạn, validation process

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Technical teams không update CMDB
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Integration với automation tools, enforcement policy, metrics

Process QA.objective: Xây dựng Process QA function từ 0 với systematic audit approach, coverage expansion và continuous improvement để đảm bảo ITSM compliance và maturity

in_scope: Audit checklists cho IM, CM, PM
Audit frequency tăng từ yearly lên quarterly

key_deliverables: Audit checklists cho 10 ITSM processes (IM, CM, PM, RFC, CMDB, SLM, etc.)
Metrics tracking framework (10+ KPIs per process)
Escalation matrix cho findings (Critical < 7 days, High < 30 days)

milestones: T12: Q4 audit, annual compliance report

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Process owners resist audit, không cooperate
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Position audit as help not blame, management support, collaborative approach

risks_and_mitigation.risk: PQA team thiếu technical knowledge
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Hire experienced auditors, continuous training, SME support

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Findings không được remediate
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Clear escalation, management visibility, track in KPIs

3rd Party Management.objective: Thiết lập formal 3rd Party Management framework với vendor governance, SLA monitoring, risk assessment và performance tracking
key_deliverables: 3PM Policy document đã được phê duyệt
Vendor inventory database (tất cả vendors hiện tại)
Vendor review process (quarterly for Tier 1, biannual for Tier 2)

milestones: T6: Full SLA monitoring, risk assessment

customers: All teams sử dụng vendor services

resources_required.training: Vendor management best practices, Contract management, Risk assessment

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Vendors không provide SLA data
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Contract clause yêu cầu reporting, escalation process

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Vendor classification subjective
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Clear criteria (spend, criticality, replaceability), stakeholder review

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Resource constraints - too many vendors
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Prioritize Tier 1, consolidate vendors nếu có thể

Quality Control.objective: Transform QC function từ ad-hoc thành systematic approach với QC strategy, test automation, metrics-driven và compliance với international standards
key_deliverables: Test automation framework và strategy (target 60% automation Year 1)
Test data management process và tool
ISO 29119 compliance gap analysis và roadmap
Quality gates checklist (6 gates từ requirements → production)
QC training program (automation, performance, security testing)
Release testing checklist và rollback plans
success_criteria: Performance baseline established cho 100% critical flows
QC team automation skill từ 25% lên 70%
GDPR compliance testing: 100% cho PII-related features

resources_required.training: Test automation, Performance testing, Security testing, ISTQB certification

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Automation skill gap lớn (current 25-30%)
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Intensive training program, hire automation experts, external consultants

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Chỉ 1 test environment - bottleneck và conflicts
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Setup thêm environments, containerization, environment booking system

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Development team resistance to quality gates
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Clear communication, gradual enforcement, management support

risks_and_mitigation.risk: Test data management phức tạp (GDPR, PII)
risks_and_mitigation.mitigation: Data masking tools, synthetic data generation, legal review
